body:
Hey everyone, this discussion is going top be my official 'stream' of channel updates and uploaded, and to start it off, i have some anticipated news:
My first two episodes of our very own Nebula are up on YouTube, one features an introduction to myself and the channel along with some gameplay, and the 2nd video has more talk on the game along with a flying hacker? and plenty of deaths :S

Here's a link if you wanna check it out:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DRRmPk-rbPM
body_tagged:

title: New Video On Channel!

replies.body: thanks man, the support really means alot :)
replies.body_tagged: thanks man, the support really means alot :)

replies.body: You are still spamming the forums with your channel, why? As I told you before, I won't subscribe until you stop spamming.
replies.body_tagged: You are still spamming the forums with your channel, why? As I told you before, I won't subscribe until you stop spamming.

replies.body: please put this under media now avicus lounge !

replies.body:
no, you just didn't listen to my last post did you?
This is my OFFICIAL stream/discussion for my channel. It is the only one i am making, rather than multiple streams, if you want me to put it in media, then ill do so, but i don't know how

replies.body: Click the edit button, scroll to the bottom, change the avicus lounge thing to media, then update the discussion.

replies.body: Isn't the actual recording from like 2weeks ago? Also a few tips, don't always talk about how your yt channel works, spam jump and blockhit in tight spaces and when you respawn quickly check behind you because I was trapped inside your spawn shifting next to the newly spawned players and they didn't notice :p

replies.body:
ahaha :) Thanks for the tips man :) 
And yeah, i decided to get new footage for the first episode (no watermarks).
Ill take that advice for the 2nd episode :D

Nice work and keep it up :)
